name: User#2744
description:
Hello User#2744...

"It's been years since it all ended. It's just you and the machine now, the grinding of gears and blinking of the monitors.

You're wandering, running, always just scraping by trying to survive. Is this all you're meant to be?"

Hey! This is my first ever super short twine game, so I hope you like it. I've gone for mechs and post-apocalyptic, because who doesn't love both of those themes!?

I'm still experimenting with it all but I thought i'd upload my first project. Any feedback is greatly appreciated, and if you'd like to donate then that is also massively appreciated.
